Uses of Interface
com.github.bwsoft.iris.message.Field

  • Packages that use Field 
    Package Description
    com.github.bwsoft.iris.message
    To compose or parse a structured message containing fields, repeating groups, or nested repeating groups.
    com.github.bwsoft.iris.message.sbe
    An implementation of the message structure upon the Simple Binary Encoding (SBE).

    • Uses of Field in com.github.bwsoft.iris.message

      Subinterfaces of Field in com.github.bwsoft.iris.message 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Group
      A group is a special field that contains other fields and/or nested groups.
      interface  Message
      A message is a special Group without a parent.
